actions.description: The broom makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Broomstick

conditionImmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone
name: Animated Broom

specialTraits.description: If the broom is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the broom move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the broom is animate.
specialTraits.name: False Object

specialTraits.description: The broom doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
specialTraits.name: Flyby
